name: @hol-org/flora-price-oracle
description: Example Flora/Petal appnet demonstrating consensus over HBAR price data with a fast block time.

scripts.build: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm exec esbuild src/petal.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --target=node20 --outfile=dist/petal.cjs --external:pg --external:pg-native --external:bufferutil --external:utf-8-validate && pnpm exec esbuild src/consumer.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --target=node20 --outfile=dist/consumer.cjs --external:pg --external:pg-native --external:bufferutil --external:utf-8-validate
